official_title: A bill to authorize modifications of the project for flood protection on the Mississippi River, Guttenberg Iowa, to Hamburg Bay, Illinois.

summary.text: Modifies a flood protection project on the Mississippi River to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to increase the flood protection at Muscatine, Iowa. Flood control Rivers
